subject: Track and Field
Marathon Running
Olympic Games (2012)
Running
lead_paragraph: After injury, illness and the birth of her second child, Paula Radcliffe will run the Berlin Marathon on Sunday in an attempt to qualify for the 2012 Olympics.
snippet: After injury, illness and the birth of her second child, Paula Radcliffe will run the Berlin Marathon on Sunday in an attempt to qualify for the 2012 Olympics.
